message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.CV. 

This paper is about a method to enhance reinforcement learning algorithms with experience replay. The paper focuses on off-policy deep reinforcement learning, which is a subfield of machine learning and artificial intelligence (cs.LG, cs.AI). The method proposed in the paper is applicable to a wide range of reinforcement learning problems, including flow control problems, which are often studied in robotics and control systems (cs.RO, cs.SY). The paper also mentions using the method with continuous-action problems, which are common in computer vision and image processing tasks (cs.CV). Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, and cs.CV.
